question: Which county has announced its plan to enrich uranium to 20 per cent?
explanation:
Iran has announced to International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) that it plans to enrich its uranium to 20% purity, which was a level achieved before 2015 accord. This is supposed to be done at its Fordow site which is buried into a mountain.
Iran has been continuously breaching the 2015 deals with IAEA since 2019, in response to USAâ€™s withdrawal from the agreement and imposition of sanctions against Iran.
